scope.title: Base set "U.K. Print" or "U.K. 4th print" 2000 Holos
scope.description: The holo cards in the 4th print of the original Base set that include the copyright "1999-2000" are Alakazam, Blastoise, Chansey, Charizard, Clefairy, Gyarados, Hitmonchan, Machamp, Magneton, Mewtwo, Nidoking, Ninetales, Poliwrath, Raichu, Venusaur, Zapdos
scope.cards: alakazam, blastoise, chansey, charizard, clefairy, gyarados, hitmonchan, machamp, magneton, mewtwo, nidoking, ninetales, poliwrath, raichu, venusaur, zapdos
